name: School of Handicraft Award Medal
obverse: An owl perched atop a column. Around the column are industrial, art, and agricultural instruments.
reverse: Blank area for hand carving an inscription for the recipient of the award.
reverse_inscriptions: Till Sophie Granlrig Skolans 4c pris for Eigurritning 1818663
description: This medal was made to present to students in the School of Handicraft. It started being minted in 1862.
This particular medal was inscribed to Sophie Granlrig for 4th place.
